title: Comment pratiquer la magnétothérapie et améliorer la circulation de l'énergie magnétique dans le corps pour guérir les maladies?
first_phrase: This text discusses the practice of magnetotherapy and its potential benefits for healing various ailments. The text explains how thoughts and voice can impact the body's currents and offers advice on using magnetic passes to align the body's nervous system. The text delves into the science of Pacinian corpuscles and how they can impact the body's electrical activity, leading to health problems. The importance of a healthy soul, psyche, and proper brain activity is emphasized. The intro to the final part highlights how magnetism can help in illnesses caused by an imbalance of the body's electrical activity. The importance of body and mind connection is explained, and the discussion on the effectiveness of homoeopathy versus magnetism is also touched upon.
